storyInfo:
A conflagration claims the lives of many innocents, and a mysterious group of Infected prepare to make their move.
Folinic and Suzuran bitterly wait for news of Atro, an operator missing in action in Leithanien, but only receive news of a Catastrophe that has struck the region.

attributes.content: 3:23 P.M. \ Clear
Underneath a nondescript oak tree, outside the nomadic town of Wolumonde, Leithanien
Schultz Severin... This is your third pack of the day.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Schultz?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Oh, sorry, Uncle...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I need my tobacco. You're right, of course. Alcohol and tobacco are bad habits. Don't be like me.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But your cough keeps getting worse.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: We're off the clock. No need to be so formal. How many times have I told you? Never mind.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: He looks away. The burned tents, the weeds growing out of control. He flicks the ash from his cigarette.
He hoped to find some peace and quiet in his solitude, even if it was just a change of his title.
*Sigh*... They made you come all the way out here!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The bunch of old schemers. They won't even come to me themselves. They send out a little girl to get hurt——*Cough* *cough*, *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Calm down, Uncle! I volunteered. I thought it would be better to tell you myself.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: *Wheeze*——*cough* *cough*, *cough* *cough*——
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: You really have to quit smoking and drinking. Look how bad you've gotten...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I've more or less figured it out. Damn it.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Well, there was a heated discussion back in council. The young people hid in the parlor. No one dared to speak.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: No, no one helped me. I couldn't convince anyone on my own. I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: The situation has been tense since the town went off course. We don't need to be standing on ceremony anymore. Not that anyone would listen to students and kids, even if they did speak up.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And then what happened?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The councilors agreed that because it was impossible to distinguish between Infected and the state of their infection, it's better safe than sorry...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: The bodies need to be buried outside the town. And of course... no funerals.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I... I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: But some of them are people of Wolumonde. Our own. We can't just abandon them.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Eckehard was the best tailor in town. He took over the shop from his father. We wouldn't have weddings without him.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And poor Biederman. He lost his job as a Catastrophe Messenger because of the Great Rift. But he's trying to atone. He is strong.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Kevin wasn't Infected. He worked hard for his wife. He was a good husband.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And Thorwald, he——*cough* *cough*, *hack* *cough*——
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: No more smoking, Schultz. Thor even said so.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Can you accept it, child? Honestly? Forget what the old schemers think.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I... I don't know...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I just want Thor to be buried so he can rest in peace. I don't want people treating him like he's a threat when he's already dead... to be tossed out there... to the elements.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Why do we have to treat them like that? We never did anything like that before.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: And that Oripathy doctor. She was incredible. She refused to abandon Wolumonde. All four of them have the right to a decent burial, but——
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Putting them together with the Infected——
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We should just be blaming the fire.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But... But let's save that for later. For now, we can't just dump their remains.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I contacted the nearest Gendarmerie, and they will have experts on the rescue team to assist with the investigation. Until then, we'll keep the bodies where I can care for them.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Once we have specialists on scene, we can treat the dead with appropriate care.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We can still get help?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: They could be a month out, depending on the exact length of the rift. It could honestly be several months.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Wolumonde is getting worse and worse every day now that we're off course. Everyone is saying we'll have to head around the whole Great Rift to get back on track.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: But if the Great Rift is that big, if the detour is too long...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Anyway, we have to wait.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Give me a minute with Thor. I think... I think I'm entitled to that.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: If the old schemers want to leave my boy in the middle of nowhere, they'll have to shoot their own Schultz.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They'll have to shoot me.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They won't! We all know how much you've done for the town!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: ...No, forget I said that.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I can't say that at a time like this. The Schultz can't talk like that. We have work to do.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But Thor is still your son!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Tatjana, you go back and tell them. Tell them...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Tell them...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Tell them I agree. *Cough*. I agree with them.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough* cough*, *cough* *cough*——
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They came back.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Hm.
Thanks to the locals, we were able to slip into the nearby town and replenish our supplies.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: The hunters will be back soon. Hope we get something today. I'm sick of sandworms. Two days is enough.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Hm.
How about water?
Not an issue. Gotta thank them for that too.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: But seriously, I don't like talking to them. I always feel like they're looking down on me.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Hm.
It looks like Wolumonde is going to start migrating again soon. We have to see some results by then.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: We have help. It will be good.
Help...? Maybe.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: But I don't trust the local Infected. They're just out for revenge.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Leithanien is better to the Infected than most places are. And since everyone here uses Arts, they don't have much reason to fear or persecute them.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: And isn't it enough that the Infected can have a decent life here without being sent straight to the gallows?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: I think they're just a bunch of thugs, stealing our name for their own purposes—
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Name?
What's in... a name?
Erm...
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: We don't trust them... fine. But... who do we trust? Who should we trust?
Can you stop talking so creepily? Whatever you say, captain.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
Oh, a leaf. It fell on your head...
Huh? What?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: A few boxes of dried meat. Fresh-picked fruit. Water. It's early autumn. Still a long way to winter...
We have time.
Okay. You're still kind of confusing me with that talk.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Anyway, it's your call when to start the war.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: War? No...
Huh?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Look. The hunters are back.
Seems our food will be better tonight.
I hope so. We should eat more meat while we can. Food is going to be a big problem come winter.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Did Bob ever write back?
Haven't heard from him since we got to Leithanien... Erm, by the way, I've been meaning to ask...
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Like, was his code name 'Bob' and they started calling him 'Big Bob' because he's a big guy, or was he 'Big Bob' from the start?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: ...I don't remember.
Whatever. They're bounty hunters. Maybe they found the treasure.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Treasure. Hm.
It would be nice... if there was a treasure to help us too.
It's been 27 days!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: How could she take so long to make contact? She's obsessed with punctuality!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Atro... where are you...?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Folinic?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Oh, Lisa... Err, I'm supposed to call you Operator Suzuran now, huh?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: It's a good code name.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Hehe, thanks!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: You've been watching the communication room for 20 hours now. Aren't you going to take a break?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Has it been that long?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Yes! So please go to the break room and get some rest. I'll take over for you.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Okay... It's really been that long...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Still no word from Atro?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: None yet. I already put in an application to go to Leithanien. If Amiya approves, I'll leave right away.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Leithanien? Don't you have work to do?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: She's my classmate, and my best friend. I can't... I won't abandon her.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Atro's last contact was with the office in northern Leithanien. Unless something big happened, she wouldn't go far from there.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Then I'll go too!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Huh?! Harsh...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: You- you just want to find Atro, right? It won't be dangerous?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Who knows what the situation could be.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: That's okay! I'm a fully accredited operator now, and a student of Dr. Kal'tsit!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: And I can't stand seeing my big sister Folinic's worried face all the time! I have to do something!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: *Sigh*. I never imagined little Lisa would worry about me someday. Everything's all out of order lately.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Big or small, we all have worries.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Well, okay! I reported in to the local branch office anyway. If anything goes wrong, they'll send help.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Let's just wait for Amiya's approval and then we'll go together. But you'll have to stay close by me.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: A message? Is it Atro?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: No. It's a brief, sent by an operator in Leithanien who received our message.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Folinic?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Atro was spotted in a small town in Leithanien... And about one month ago...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: That town suffered a Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Folinic
